price: (180) Exalted is your Lord, the Lord of might, above what they describe.
arabic: سُبۡحَٰنَ رَبِّكَ رَبِّ ٱلۡعِزَّةِ عَمَّا يَصِفُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: sub'ḥāna rabbika rabbi al-ʿizati ʿammā yaṣifūna
